member.name: P:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.reconnectTries
member.summary: Reads or sets the number of retires to perform if a connection can't be established

member.name: P:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.reconnectTimeout
member.summary: Reads or sets the number of milliseconds to wait between two connection attempts

member.name: P:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.timeout
member.summary: Reads or sets the number of milliseconds to wait for incoming data before stop reading

member.name: P:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.strictVersionControl
member.summary: Gets or sets whether strict version control is activated. If True, only commands that pass the isCompatible() check will be executed.

member.name: P:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.checkInterval
member.summary: Reads or sets the interval in milliseconds the connection status will be checked.
member.value: The number of milliseconds between connection checks
member.returns: The number of milliseconds between connection checks

member.name: E:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.disconnected
member.summary: Fires if this connection has been disconnected.

member.name: E:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.connected
member.summary: Fires if this connection has been connected to the remote host.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new CasparCGConnection to the given serverAddress and serverPort

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new CasparCGConnection to the given serverAddress and the default port

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new CasparCGConnection to localhost and the default port

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.connect
member.summary: Connects to the given server and port and returns true if a connection could be established and false otherwise.
member.returns: true, if and only if the connection is established, false otherwise

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the given server and port and returns true if a connection could be established and false otherwise.
member.returns: true, if and only if the connection is established, false otherwise

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.isConnected(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return whether or not the CasparCGConnection is connect to the server. If tryConnect is given and true, it will try to establish a connection if not Already connected.
member.returns: true, if and only if the connection is established, false otherwise

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.close
member.summary: Disconnects and closes the connection to the CasparCG Server

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.isOSCSupported
member.summary: Returns whether or not the connected CasparCG Server supports OSC
member.returns: true, if and only if a connection is established and the sever supports OSC

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.getVersion
member.summary: Returns the version string of the connected CasparCG Server
member.returns: The version of the connected server or 0.0.0 if not connected

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.getVersionPart(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a specific part of the version number. e.g.: If the version is 2.0.1 Beta3, you would get getVersionPart(0) = 2 getVersionPart(2) = 1 getVersionPart(3) = -1
member.param: The part of the version starting by 0
Optional version string to get the part form. If not set, the version of the connected server will be parsed
member.returns: The numberical part of the version or -1 if the part is not pressent or not numerical

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.getServerChannels
member.summary: Returns the number of channels on the connected CasparCG Server
member.returns: The number of channels

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.sendAsyncCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a command to the casparCG server and returns imediatly after sending no matter if the command was accepted or not.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.sendCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a command to the casparCG server and returns a CasparCGResonse. sendCommand will wait until it receives a returncode. So it may stay longer inside the function. If the given commandstring has more than one casparCG command, the response will be only for one of those!

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.getServerAddress
member.summary: Returns the CasparCG Server address this connection is using
member.returns: The IP or DNS address of this connection

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.getServerPort
member.summary: Returns the port number this connection is using
member.returns: The TCP port nummber of this connection

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.setServerAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the address on which this connection tries to connect to the casparCG Server.
member.param: The IP or DNS address of the server
member.returns: True if this connection is not connected and the address could be set, False otherwise.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.setServerPort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the port on which this connection tries to connect to the casparCG Server.
member.returns: True if this connection is not connected and the port could be set, False otherwise.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.isLayerFree(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns whether or not a layer of a channel is free, which means no producer is playing on it.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection.getFreeLayer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the smallest free layer of the given channel

member.name: T:CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGCommandFactory.Command
member.summary: Enummerates the possible CasparCGCommands

member.summary: Escapes the string str as needed for casparCG Server

member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.summary: Notifies that the medias metadata (infos) has been filled.

member.summary: Notifies that the thumbnail of the media has been filled.

member.name: E:CasparCGNETConnector.ICasparCGMedia.InfoChanged
member.summary: Notifies that an info of this media has been changed.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.ICasparCGMedia.fillMediaInfo(CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills the metadata informations given by the casparCG servers info command. The media will be loaded to background on the given channel and the first free layer. After polling the the INFO, the layer will be cleared again. It is recommend to use a non production channel for this
member.param: The connection on which the info should be requested
The channel to load the media on

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.ICasparCGMedia.fillThumbnail(CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection@)
member.summary: Retrieves a thumbnail (if present and support) using the given serverconnection.

member.summary: Fills the metadata informations given by the casparCG servers info command. The media will be loaded to background on the given channel and the first free layer. After polling the the INFO, the layer will be cleared again. It is recommend to use a non production channel for this
member.param: The connection on which the info should be requested
The channel to load the media on

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.AbstractCasparCGMedia.fillThumbnail(CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection@)
member.summary: Retrieves a thumbnail (if present and support) using the given serverconnection.

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.AbstractCommand.execute(CasparCGNETConnector.CasparCGConnection@)
member.summary: Executes the command using the given connection and returns the CasparCGResponse. Throws a NotSupportedException if the command is not compatible to the CasparCG Server version.
member.param: the CasparCGConnection to execute the command on
member.returns: a CasparCGResponse if, and only if the command is compatible to the connected server version, else throws a NotSupportedException

member.name: M:CasparCGNETConnector.AbstractCommand.getResponse
member.summary: Returns the CasparCGResponse of the last command execution or nothing.
member.returns: the CasparCGResponse or nothing
